automation.title: Automation Technology & Switchgear Construction
automation.description: From planning to commissioning - we implement complete automation solutions for industry and commerce. Our expertise includes modern PLC systems and customized switchgear.
automation.planning_desc: Detailed project planning and technical design according to current standards and regulations.
automation.installation_desc: Professional assembly and installation by qualified electrical specialists on site.

planning_details.title: Planning & Engineering
planning_details.subtitle: Professional project planning for automation solutions
planning_details.description: Our experienced engineers develop customized automation solutions that are perfectly tailored to your requirements. From the initial idea to detailed implementation planning, we guide you through the entire planning process.
services: Technical concept development and system design
Creation of circuit diagrams and wiring diagrams
Standards-compliant documentation according to VDE and IEC
Integration into existing systems and infrastructures
technologies: CAD software for electrical planning (EPLAN, AutoCAD Electrical)

installation_details.title: Assembly & Installation
installation_details.subtitle: Professional implementation by qualified electrical specialists
installation_details.description: Our experienced assembly team implements your automation projects precisely and on schedule. We pay attention to the highest quality standards and compliance with all safety regulations.
services: Assembly of control cabinets and distributors
Installation of PLC systems and controls
Laying and connection of cables and lines
Installation of HMI panels and operating devices
Setup of network and communication infrastructure
Documentation and labeling of all components

service_details.title: Commissioning & Service
service_details.subtitle: Complete commissioning and long-term support
service_details.description: After installation, we ensure smooth commissioning of your systems. Our service team is also available for long-term maintenance, updates and troubleshooting.
